about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: At El Punto Bar Restaurante, we celebrate authentic Peruvian cuisine with a modern twist. We are passionate about offering unforgettable gastronomic experiences in a cozy and sophisticated atmosphere.
about.paragraph2: Whether you come with friends, as a couple, or with family, we welcome you with the best flavors of Peru and top-quality service.

hero.title: Peruvian Flavors that Captivate
hero.subtitle: A place where Peruvian gastronomy blends with good vibes, music, and a unique experience.

contact.title: Contact Us 📞
contact.description: Book your table or place your order. We’re delighted to serve you at El Punto Bar!

reviews.name: Pau Scalona
reviews.text: DELICIOUS. The best ceviche and causa in Barcelona. Incredible sauces, super fresh fish, and great service. Very reasonable prices — worth every cent.

reviews.name: Josue A. Gonzales L.
reviews.text: It’s my first time here and the service was great. I ate exactly what I wanted, how I wanted, haha… I totally recommend it! 🇵🇪👍🏻

reviews.name: Ibai Zabaleta
reviews.text: Authentic Peruvian cuisine. Unbeatable daily menu, tasty traditional dishes, and friendly service. Highly recommended.
